action.action-desc: Mr. Banks of Indiana (for himself and Mr. Courtney) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to allow food concessions at State-owned interstate rest areas.

subsection.text: Section 111(b)(2) of title 23, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating subparagraphs (D) and (E) as subparagraphs (E) and (F), respectively; and
by inserting after subparagraph (C) the following:

subparagraph.text: concessions, including restaurants, food services, and convenience stores;

subsection.text: Section 111(b)(4) of such title is amended by adding at the end the following: Notwithstanding the preceding sentence, a State may use revenues received from concessions under paragraph (2)(D) to support any program authorized under this title..
